mision.title: My mission
mision.description: Devs is a platform dedicated to connecting developers from all over the world. My goal is to create a space where developers can share ideas, learn, and collaborate on exciting projects. From articles to interactive challenges, I aim to offer useful resources to improve technical skills and stay up-to-date with the latest trends in the world of web development.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: My vision is to be a platform for collaboration and learning for developers worldwide. I want to be the place where developers of all ages and skill levels can meet, learn, and grow together.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.description: Devs was created by me, Ignacio Figueroa, a web developer. Always seeking to learn and share knowledge about the latest technologies, I firmly believe in the power of community to improve everyone’s skills.

items.title: Collaboration
items.description: I foster an environment where everyone can contribute, learn, and grow together.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: I am always looking to offer innovative resources and tools to keep the community up-to-date with the latest technological trends.

items.title: Accessibility
items.description: My goal is for everyone, regardless of experience, to have access to the same opportunities to learn and improve.

items.title: Community
items.description: I believe in the power of connections and the value of collaboration to improve as professionals.

join.title: Join devs!
join.description: I’m excited to build an incredible community of developers! If you are a developer passionate about learning and sharing, I invite you to join the platform and be part of it. Sign up today and start connecting with other developers.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me via the following email:

blog.title: Explore Web Development
blog.description: Explore articles, trends, and strategies crafted to enhance your skills, streamline your workflow, and keep you at the forefront of technological innovation. Join our community of experts and elevate your impact in the development world.

register.title: Register on devs

name.label: Name
name.description: This is the name that will be displayed on your profile.

errors.minCharacters: The name must have at least 2 characters.
errors.maxCharacters: The name must not exceed 30 characters.
errors.allowedCharacters: The name can only contain letters and spaces.

email.label: Email
email.description: Your email will never be shared with anyone.

errors.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address.

password.label: Password
password.description: Your password must be at least 8 characters long.

errors.minCharacters: The password must have at least 8 characters.
errors.maxCharacters: The password must not exceed 50 characters.
errors.shouldIncludeOneLetter: The password must include at least one letter.
errors.shouldIncludeOneNumber: The password must include at least one number.

register.orUseEmail: Or sign up with your email
